sentences: Klaudjo Dhespo (Albanian: [klauˈdjɔ ðɛsˈpɔ]; born 6 December 1994), known professionally as Toquel, is a Greek-Albanian rapper and songwriter.
Toquel was born as Klaudjo Dhespo on 6 December 1994 into an Albanian family in the city of Tepelenë, Albania.
His family moved from his native country to Heraklion, Greece, when he was 11 months old.

His family moved from his native country to Heraklion, Greece, when he was 11 months old. During an interview in Greece, Dhespo stated that he experienced discrimination because of his Albanian origin.
Dhespo's stage name, Toquel, was inspired by a therapist from Chania, Greece, who helped him to manage his panic attacks.
